name: Hellish Rebuke
description: The creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by green flames. It makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d10 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
higherLevels: The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 1.

castingTime.reactionCondition: when a creature you can see within 60 feet damages you
